name: Discolored (itch)
description:
You play as Colorvo, a Spectrum that hides in the colors and disorients his foes with his skills. Your mission is to bring harmony to the kingdom by recovering the colors.

Move with W A S D or ARROW KEYS

Look around  with your mouse

Hold LeftClick on object to change it's color to yours

Hold RightClick on object to set your color to the objects color
